about_the_game:
[Transcript from 1959 experimental Sputnik launch, Read with Russian accent] This is Launch control. Cabin atmosphere and pressure stable. Testmonkey is in seat. Ignition sequence starts. 4... 3... 2... 1... Boost. We have lift-off. All tanks pressurized. Tower cleared. Wait minute... Monkey is out of seat. Monkey get back in seat! Yuri!!! No Yuri that is not banana, that is experimental warpcompressor control mechanism. Yuri! Take out of mouth. Nooo! Yuri You're short circuiting the... (static).

This DLC contains a custom skin for Yuri in Awesomenauts. You need to have Yuri available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
detailed_description:
[Transcript from 1959 experimental Sputnik launch, Read with Russian accent] This is Launch control. Cabin atmosphere and pressure stable. Testmonkey is in seat. Ignition sequence starts. 4... 3... 2... 1... Boost. We have lift-off. All tanks pressurized. Tower cleared. Wait minute... Monkey is out of seat. Monkey get back in seat! Yuri!!! No Yuri that is not banana, that is experimental warpcompressor control mechanism. Yuri! Take out of mouth. Nooo! Yuri You're short circuiting the... (static).

This DLC contains a custom skin for Yuri in Awesomenauts. You need to have Yuri available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

name: Awesomenauts - Kosmonaut Yuri Skin

short_description: This DLC contains a custom skin for Yuri in Awesomenauts. You need to have Yuri available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
